amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the purposes of conducting combat operations in Iraq.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 250 (Roll no. 325).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 250 (Roll no. 325).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
